name: Steamknight (Ankou77)
description:
Steamknight is a third-person jump-n-run game that takes the player on an adventure through a beautiful world, based on an medieval-steampunk style.

Things are not as pleasant as they seem however...

The protagonist and the rest of the world are infected by a plague. You were choosen from a selected few to wear an sickness-supressing amor with the task to reach the main-clocktower. How will things turn out as you find out the truth about how it all started?

Discover the vibrant world of steamknight as you make your way across flying platforms, dangerous traps and the ruins of a once thriving civilization.

                                   ╭──╯  More info  ╰──╮

Steamknight is a solo developed project that was made for the Third semester at htk academy. 

It is playable on PC with keyboard & mouse or with a controller.

                                                   Controls:

                                                           Press

                                                              

                                                              or

                                              

                                                        to move

                                                       press

                                                 

                                   to interact and to skip cutscenes

                                                       press
